QuestData.Title: Barum's Notes
QuestData.Description: <This hefty tome contains notes on the refining and shaping of Draenor's natural gems and crystals, including several full-page technical diagrams depicting complex cut patterns.$B$BThe most recent pages detail a series of cuts intended to aid the draenei vindicators in battle.>$B$B"...honed to a fine edge, the material can expose weaknesses..."$B$B"when rounded and polished to such a degree, it wards off harmful..."$B$B"...this incredible discovery that a crystal can be attuned to the bearer's vitality!"
QuestData.LogDescription: Test the effects of a Honed Crystal, a Polished Crystal and a Harmonic Crystal in Aruuna.
QuestData.CompletionText: Hm, what is that book you have there?
QuestData.RewardText: My notes! In the chaos, I completely forgot about them!$B$BThis is my life's work, $p. I cannot thank you enough.
